title: Justice Comics
additional-notes: A note in the January-June 1976 CCE Periodicals volume for 'Justice Comics' says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information, as did a note in the January-June 1977 CCE Periodicals volume for 'Justice'.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the Fall 1947 issue, and was filed in 1975.
Issue numbering reset to 4 for the August 1948 issue.
